incident_updates.body: Start time : 12/12/2023 17:23 UTC Service impact : Services in Grenoble site are degraded. Ongoing actions : Investigating Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Start time : 12/12/2023 22:00 UTC End time : 12/12/2023 23:30 UTC Service impact : You may experience increased latency to communicate with your services behind this device. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade a network equipment configuration.
